Style/StabbyLambdaParentheses.description:
Description

Checks for the usage of parentheses around stabby lambda arguments.
Style/StabbyLambdaParentheses.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

EnforcedStyle: require_parentheses (type: str)
SupportedStyles: ['require_parentheses', 'require_no_parentheses'] (type: list)
